Transcription for 548061

See, I've whitt'd, see, I've whitt'd,
Good man, it hide your truth.
Am I a rightful inquire,
With your yarm up and loose?
Such a young person I've been and found,
Was the grill of Dorel beat at my rind,
When I was a child,
Who, who, who, who, who,
Who, who, who, who, who,
Kustan drog, kustan drog,
Kinder me guy I think,
Adored, don't ensign your court,
Where may my joy come stay?
Kustan, darlin', what a brother I've been,
Kustan, guy I think, for no one I've been,
Kustan, darlois, be gone,
Kustan, darlin', what a brother I've been,
Kustan, darlois, be gone,
Kustan, darlois, be gone,
Kustan, darlois, be gone,
